sen.j: 西洞院通（にしのとういんどおり）は京都市の南北の道路の一つ。
sen.e: The Nishi-no-Toin-dori street is a north-south running street in Kyoto City.
The Nishi-no-Toin-dori street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.
The Nishinotoin-dori Street is a street running north-south through Kyoto City.

sen.j: 平安京の西洞院大路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Nishi-no-Toino-Oji / Nishi-no-Toin-Oji Street of Hiekankyo.
It corresponds to Nishi-no-Toino-Oji / Nishi-no-Toin-Oji Street of Hiekankyo.
It corresponds to Nishinotoin-oji / Nishinotoin-oji Street of Heiankyo.
sen.cmt: 道の表記を修正スペルを修正

sen.j: かつては塩小路通 - 四条通間を京都市電.E5.A0.80.E5.B7.9D.E7.B7.9Aが通っていたため、塩小路通 - 蛸薬師通間は2車線道路、蛸薬師以北は南行の一方通行となっている。
sen.e: Kyoto shiden (Kyoto Municipal Steetcar) E5.A0.80.E5.B7.9D.E7.B7.9A ran along the section between the Shiokoji-dori Street and the Shijo-dori Street., and thereby the section between the Shiokoji-dori Street and Takoyakushi-dori Street is a 2-lane street; the section north of Takoyakushi is one-way traffic toward the north.

Kyoto shiden (Kyoto Municipal Steetcar) E5.A0.80.E5.B7.9D.E7.B7.9A ran along the section between Shiokoji-dori Street and Shijo-dori Street, and thereby the section between Shiokoji-dori Street and Takoyakushi-dori Street is a 2-lane street; the section north of Takoyakushi is comprised of one-way traffic headed south.

Kyoto shiden (Kyoto Municipal Streetcar) E5.A0.80.E5.B7.9D.E7.B7.9A ran along the section between Shiokoji-dori Street and Shijo-dori Street, and thereby the section between Shiokoji-dori Street and Takoyakushi-dori Street is a 2-lane street; the section north of Takoyakushi is comprised of one-way traffic headed south.

sen.j: 平安京においては幅24m（8丈）の大路であった。
sen.e: In Heiankyo, it was a 24-meter wide main street.
In Heiankyo, it was a 24-meter wide main street.
In Heiankyo, it was a 24-meter wide main street.

sen.j: 京都府庁敷地内での発掘調査により、沿道の建物が建て替えられるたびに道幅が狭められ、現在のような狭い道となった過程が明らかになった。
sen.e: It has been made clear that the street became narrower and narrower to the current width every time buildings along the street were rebuilt as the result of excavation researches within the precinct of Kyoto Prefectural Head Office.

It has been made clear that the street became narrower and narrower each time buildings along the street were rebuilt, until it reached its current wideth, as a result of excavation researches within the precinct of Kyoto Prefectural Head Office.

It has been made clear that the street became narrower and narrower each time buildings along the street were rebuilt, until it reached its current width, as a result of excavation researches within the precinct of Kyoto Prefectural Head Office.

sen.j: 五条天神社（西洞院松原通）
sen.e: Gojoten Jinja Shrine (Nishi-no-Toin-Matsubara-dori Street)
Gojoten Jinja Shrine (Nishi-no-Toin-Matsubara-dori Street)
Gojoten Jinja Shrine (Nishinotoin-Matsubara-dori Street)

sen.j: 目川重治（西洞院六条通下ル）
sen.e: Shigeharu MEKAWA (Nishi-no-Toin Rokujo-dori Sagaru (to the south of Nishi-no-Toin Rokujo))
Shigeharu MEKAWA (Nishi-no-Toin Rokujo-dori Sagaru (to the south of Nishi-no-Toin Rokujo))
Shigeharu MEKAWA (Nishinotoin Rokujo-dori Sagaru (to the south of Nishinotoin Rokujo))
